alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Grady, southwestern Oklahoma, northwestern Cleveland and southeastern Canadian Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 200 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Oklahoma City, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Oklahoma City, Moore, Mustang, Tuttle, and Will Rogers Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 139 and 142. Interstate 44 between mile markers 109 and 119. Interstate 240 between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
